name: NEBUXEL - MEMORY
description:
Part of Gammatrace’s renowned Nebuxel series, this artwork is called “Memory”.

The subject, with its nebuxels characterized with beaming light in contrast with the dark surroundings, represents the custodian of our memory, such a fundamental component to the human mind and connection to one’s self.

Memory, that is not only extended to oneself, but shared and passed down through generations, leaving it’s indelible trace on humanity as a whole. 

Fast forward to today, and we have extended this innate gift of ours to technology. The web has been flooded with our data, memories…Our whole entire life. 

So much to a degree that it’s safe to say, technology has become our Custodian, dedicated to keeping our memory alive even after we perish and avoiding what we mostly fear: eternal oblivion.
